abstract: New York Giants head into their bye week with a 4-2 record, atop the NFC East, having forged an air of toughness from a few close finishes.
snippet: The Giants are 4-2 and in first place heading into their bye week, and confident they will have some injured stars back when they return.
lead_paragraph: The Giants are 4-2 and in first place heading into their bye week, and confident they will have some injured stars back when they return.

headline.main: Giants Enter Bye Week Liking Where They Are, and Where They’re Going
headline.print_headline: Giants Enter Bye Week Liking Where They Are, and Where They’re Going
